faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to commonly asked questions about our platform.
faq.intro: Find answers to the most common questions about our platform and services.

items.question: What is this platform about?
items.answer: This platform helps users create and manage their digital presence with powerful tools and features.

items.question: How do I create an account?
items.answer: You can create an account by clicking the Sign In button and following the registration process.

items.question: Is this service free to use?
items.answer: We offer both free and premium plans. The free plan includes basic features, while premium plans offer additional capabilities.

items.question: How can I contact support?
items.answer: You can reach our support team through the contact form on our website or by emailing support@example.com.

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings.
